channel.title: How can i get deltascape client v.1 to work?
channel.description:
how can i get deltascape client v.1 to work? i already have the .delta_store folder inside WINDOWS in drive C: and it downlaoded all spirtes 'n' all of that, so when i run the client it says "Connection error - Retrying in 10" and doesnt run.
i have deltascape source now i need the client to work.
